flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: Freezer paper stencils are one of the easiest ways to get images on to fabric, paper, wood - just about anything. They are simple to make and fun to use and are great for instant gratification. The Maker Faire robot is a perfect design for beginners, not to mention - super cool.
guide.introduction_rendered: Freezer paper stencils are one of the easiest ways to get images on to fabric, paper, wood - just about anything. They are simple to make and fun to use and are great for instant gratification. The Maker Faire robot is a perfect design for beginners, not to mention - super cool.
guide.summary: Use freezer paper to print the fun Maker Faire robot on just about anything!
guide.title: Maker Faire Robot Freezer Paper Stencil
